about.experience: With over 9 years of experience across fintech, trading platforms, and enterprise solutions, I've built products that push the boundaries of what's possible.

bachelorCSM.description:
Awarded a scholarship for a 10-month exchange program to study theoretical mathematics.
Attended one of the top 5 Computer Science & Mathematics programs for an entire academic year.
Developed practical skills in tackling real-world engineering challenges and gained experience in ADA programming.

mavxCard.title: Senior Software Engineer (Full Stack)
responsibilities: Building and maintaining micros-services for internal data management.
Building and maintaining .Net: C# and F# components.
Maintaining internal grpc communication.
Building and maintaining UI components created for dedicated Vue front end application.

Managing release process and deployment process.
